name: Block Drop (itch) (Atharva333)
description:
A simple block falling game I made as a first game using c++ and SFML.

How to play the game:
1. click on the falling blocks to kill them
2. you get points based on their colour (difficulty level)
-Blue gives you 1 point, green gives you 2 and yellow gives you 5.
3. If the blocks go off the screen you lose health.
4. If you lose all your health the game automatically closes
